title: Avatar
description: On her eternal quest to rid the world of the evil she had unleashed upon it, the wayfarer Indigo has been many things: penitent, messenger, pilgrim.And perhaps now an avatar for the dead?For Indigo's journey has lead her to the Dark Isles, where a cult of death has ensnared her and her companion Grimya...and the demon she has so long sought is now at hand.Can courage alone be enough to dance with the Queen of the Dead?
author: Louise Cooper
